The Perfect POS for Cafés & Coffee Shops

Serve your best brew without the backend hassle. Our software helps you manage orders, customers, and sales with ease.

Get a Free Demo

Features That Brew Success

Tools designed specifically for the fast-paced cafe environment.

Lightning-Fast Billing

Handle peak hour rushes with a super-fast POS designed for speed and accuracy. Less waiting, more happy customers.

Customer Loyalty & CRM

Create loyalty programs, manage customer data, and send offers to turn first-time visitors into regulars.

Real-Time Sales Analytics

Track your best-selling items, peak hours, and daily sales trends with an easy-to-understand dashboard.

Combos & Modifiers

Easily create combos and manage item modifiers (like extra shot, soy milk) for quick and accurate order taking.

QR Code Ordering

Allow customers to order and pay directly from their table using a QR code, freeing up your staff during busy times.

Simple Inventory Tracking

Keep track of your coffee beans, milk, and other essentials with simple yet effective stock management.

Focus on Your Craft, Not on Clicks

Our interface is designed to be so intuitive that your staff can be trained in minutes. Spend less time managing software and more time perfecting your coffee and connecting with customers.

  • Offline Mode: Never stop billing, even if your internet goes down.
  • Compact & Flexible: Works on any device—iPad, Android tablet, or desktop computer.
  • Affordable Plans: Get started with powerful features without breaking the bank.
